Keywords

Black Battle Icon

  1. What is a Black Battle Icon?
    There’s a new battle icon on some battle cards in War for Cybertron: Siege I. It’s black! What does it mean? If you’re on the attack, hopefully good things for you. For each black battle icon you flip while attacking, your character gets pierce 1 until end of turn. Remember that pierce numbers add up, so flipping two black icons in an attack will give your attacker pierce 2, and so on.
  2. Do black battle icons have any effect on a character that’s defending?
    No. Black battle icons flipped on defense won’t give your character pierce. (And pierce doesn’t work on defense anyway.)
